title: Beauty.and.the.Beast.S01E01.720p.HDTV.(Optimised for PS3)
description:
Beauty.and.the.Beast.S01E01.720p.HDTV.MPEG2-SM10 (Optimised for PS3)

Original Uploader: Spidermike2010
Runtime: 60 min
Language: English
Director: Gary Fleder.
Cast: Kristin Kreuk, Jay Ryan, Jason Deline, Alex Paxton-Beesley, Nicole Gale Anderson, Chris Anton, Peter Apostolopoulos, Austin Basis, Max Brown, Michael Brown.

Beauty and the Beast is an American television series very loosely inspired by the 1987 CBS series of the same name. The series premiÃƒÂ¨red on Thursday, October 11, 2012, at 9:00 pm Eastern/8:00 pm Central.

Kristin Kreuk was cast as the lead role of Catherine Chandler (Beauty) on February 16, 2012, with Jay Ryan cast in the role of Vincent Koslow (the Beast) on March 2, 2012. In the original series, Vincent had no last name, although he considered himself the adopted son of Tunnel patriarch Jacob Wells. The last name of "Koslow" (that of the original series' creator) is specific to this series. According to the trailer, his last name is now "Keller".
